relation: Sing it to the tune of "Do They Know It's Christmastime?"
textBeforeTable: > Y X W T S R P O N M L I H G F E D B A < Other Submissions by SimonBob So the moral of my article today is "This is what happens when you go crazy trying to get the Star Pendant." Don't try this at home, I'm a professional. But what about repaying the loan? That million bucks didn't appear out of nowhere. It came from the Minches. And I'm sure that Lardna would want some of it back, and with interest too. Paying back a loan that size would be like paying off a mortgage. You'd have to calculate interest and make monthly installments. If Aloysius weren't sucking back iced frappachinos in Fourside, he could be quite a rich man - even richer
